name: Creole Rice With Tomatoes and Herbs
keywords: basil, rice, tomato, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup ripe red tomato cut into 1/4-inch dice

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the water to a boil in a saucepan. Add rice. Cook at full rolling boil exactly 17 minutes. Drain immediately and return rice to saucepan.

Meanwhile, heat butter in a saucepan and add onion. Cook, stirring, until wilted. Add tomato, salt and pepper and cook briefly, stirring. Add this to the cooked rice and stir. Stir in basil and lemon juice. Serve.
